title: The Adventures of Oloorin and Co collection
description:
I have re-uploaded my torrent of the Oloorin books, since I forgot a few tags which were probably important n stuff. This torrent contains all the books released so far (Both kindle and PDF versions) in the series 'The Adventures of Oloorin and Co'. They are basically a Dungeons & Dragons fan fiction, following Oloorin and his friends as they wander the lands in search of adventure, treasure and fame.

Being the author of the books, I chose to upload these here in hopes of reaching a wider audience. This series is the first series I have written, I myself see it as no masterpiece but acceptable enough for the first few books I have written. They are not the first ever book I have written, but the first ever books I have published (via Amazon kindle publishing). The important thing is that I tried to write as good as I could.

If any of you pirate folk like my books, feel free to purchase one. They are currently available as ebooks (2.99$) or printed books (9.99$ + shipment). Its easy to find my books on Amazon, just search for their names or my author name (Mikael B Lind).

Would also love any feedback, both in the form of reviews and comments. Regardless, I hope you all enjoy my books and that they are worth reading.

May the Emprah be with you
Mikael B Lind
